content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Maryam. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great fit for your needs. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to pay 500 Euro per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. I'm looking for a price closer to 800 Euro per month. Is that something you could consider?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is too high for me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that the price might be high for you, but the location and the amenities provided are worth the investment. Is there anything else you're looking for in an apartment that I can accommodate?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, I am happy with the apartment itself. I just don't want to pay more than 600 Euro per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot meet your price expectation. The apartment is in high demand due to its central location, and I'm confident that someone will be willing to pay the market value. If you're set on a price below 600 Euro, I'm afraid we won't be able to reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 650 Euro per month!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. The apartment is worth more than that, and I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates its value. If you're not interested in paying a fair price, I'll have to look for another tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price I am offering is the highest I can afford.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, but I must find a tenant who is willing to pay the market value for this apartment. If you're not able to meet my price expectations, I'll have to consider other potential renters. Thank you for your time, and I wish you the best in your search for a suitable place to live.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
